ygData.subject: RE: Psalm Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You *do* get the same message.  If you weren t, I d take that as a sign that they were canceling eaching other. -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 22 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> I know for certain that the messages for both songs appeared, i.e. "you feel
> protected from cold". Can't confirm if the mob was actually taking damage
> from both of them though. Its hard to track all the messages that scroll
> through in a combat so when I got the confirmation that the song went into
> affect, just assumed that the mob was getting burned/frozen. Sure wish we
> got the white text message for our damage shields similar to what you get
> when you have the druid thorn buff (not certain of exact name). With the
> thorn buff, it tells you how much non-melee damage the mob took when they
> hit you. Anyone have an idea why we don't get a similar message?

You *do* get the same message. If you weren't, I'd take that
as a sign that they were canceling eaching other.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
